nodes.text: Codoan Copper was a type of copper commonly found on many worlds throughout the galaxy. During the time of the Galactic Civil War, it was often used as an essential component for the production of blasters and jewelry, including rings in particular.

Codoan Copper was a type of copper in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
